actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to exempt non-profit veterans' organizations from the requirement that certain performance royalties be paid to copyright holders.

summary.text: Exempts nonprofit veterans' organizations from the requirement that certain musical performance royalties be paid to copyright holders.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to exempt non-profit veterans' organizations from the requirement that certain performance royalties be paid to copyright holders.
